name: PL 2338/2023
scope: AI suppliers and operators in Brazil; risk-based framework
penalties: Up to R$50M or 2% of annual revenue in Brazil
transparencyRequirements: Disclosure of AI usage and explanation for high-risk outputs

name: Basic Act
scope: AI developers/providers impacting Korea; hight-impact systems
riskClassification: High-impact AI with significant or rights risk
penalties: KWR 30M (~$25K) or 3 years imprisonment ofr violations
transparencyRequirements: Lebeling for generative AI (GenAI); transparency for critical decisions
